text: I am a beginner here, and want to know can I choose CRM or ERP Developer as m career?and how scalable will it be ?Can anyone please explain?

Hey <@U06CZ3GJW69>! Here's a blog post our team did on what skills to consider in becoming a CRM developer. It's not a direct answer to your question, but you can rest assured that there is a TON of demand for these skills. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/why-hire-crm-and-api-focused-developers>
